Patreon

San Francisco, CA

We're at 3 software developers right now and we need to build out the team to keep up with growth. We need front-end, mobile, and dev/ops. And probably some more generalists, too.

Our culture is still super young, there's plenty of room to make decisions about how we're going to work and what technologies to use.

Perks include: since one of the founders is a musician (Jack Conte of Pomplamoose), we'll be putting a recording studio into the office.

Our user base is one of the most passionate in the world - an impressive number of artists have already been able to quit their day jobs because they're being supported by their true-fans through our platform.

http://www.patreon.com/jobs or email me (jesse@) to talk.
